def_cn: （置于形容词、副词、名词之前表示反义）
def_en: Un- is added to the beginning of adjectives, adverbs, and nouns, in order to form words that have the opposite meaning.

def_cn: （置于动词之前表示相反的过程）
def_en: Un- is added to the beginning of a verb that describes a process, in order to form another verb that describes the reverse of that process.

def_cn: （置于动词的过去分词之前构成形容词，表示动作尚未发生）
def_en: Un- is added to the beginning of the past participle of a verb, in order to form an adjective that means that the process described by the verb has not happened.
